recipe.title: Apricot Dipping Sauce
ingredients: 2 tablespoons soy sauce, or to taste
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste
Dash of Tabasco, or to taste
instructions: Melt jam in a small saucepan. Stir in remaining ingredients with salt and pepper to taste and serve warm.
